# cmccloudv2_elb (Data Source)



## Example Usage

```terraform
# get elb by id
data "cmccloudv2_elb" "elb1" { 
    eip_id = "af262476-df43-4ad6-a626-37b77e23ed14" 
}

# get elb by name
data "cmccloudv2_elb" "elb2" { 
    name = "elb-k4d5" 
}

# get elb by ip_address
data "cmccloudv2_elb" "elb3" { 
    ip_address = "203.171.29.45" 
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `elb_id` (String) Id of the elb
- `ip_address` (String) Filter by ip address of elb, match exactly
- `name` (String) Filter by name of elb, match exactly

### Read-Only

- `created_at` (String) Created at of the elb
- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
